name: .add
description: Construct a new instance from the current instance's elements and the provided elements

arguments.name: elems
arguments.description:
The element(s) to combine with the current elements forming the new instance. Can be any of the following:
- Node
- zQuery instance
- Selector to query for elements in the whole document
- Array-like object of elements

returns: A new zQuery instance containing the superset elements
